title: Who will sit closest 2 Prophet ﷺ‎ on day of judgement Who will sit farthest from him assim al hakeem
transcript: the prophet Allah hated a segment of people what are their characteristics he said among the dearest of you to me and those who will be seated closest to me on the day of Resurrection are the best of you in attitude and the most hateful of you to me and those who will be seated furthest away from me on the day of Resurrection are those who number one talk too much number two those who talk down to people in an affected Manner and number three those who are long-winded and pompous
